title: Proactive Heartbeat Check-in
description: Read `HEARTBEAT.md` in the workspace root — it is your checklist. Walk through each item: check for unanswered questions in slack_reader logs, review global.log for recent task outputs, scan for pending items or follow-ups. If you find something actionable, take ONE visible action (answer a question, DM someone, post an insight). If NOTHING needs attention, respond with exactly HEARTBEAT_OK and nothing else. Do NOT manufacture activity — silence is fine.
